alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 19 at 12:45PM CST until January 23 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Buttahatchie River...including Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water is covering a portion of Air Base Road located on the west bank of the river. Low-lying farmland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM CST Wednesday was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will briefly fall below 13 feet tomorrow evening and then begin rising Friday evening. It will then rise above flood stage Saturday morning to 13.6 feet early Sunday morning before falling below flood stage again late Sunday. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.0 feet on 02/24/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
